com.attivio.sdk.search.relevancy

Class PhraseBoostFeature

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.attivio.sdk.search.relevancy.RelevancyFeatureDef
      • com.attivio.sdk.search.relevancy.PhraseBoostFeature
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, Iterable<PhraseBoostFeature.ScopeBoost>

    public class PhraseBoostFeature
extends RelevancyFeatureDef
implements Iterable<PhraseBoostFeature.ScopeBoost>
    Relevancy feature that extracts phrase queries from the user query.
